author: Jackie Fox
title: Yemen facing 'disaster' if virus spreads there
description: An outbreak of Covid-19 in Yemen could be a "disaster" and "catastrophic" for the war-torn country, according to aid agencies.
content:
An outbreak of Covid-19 in Yemen could be a "disaster" and "catastrophic" for the war-torn country, according to aid agencies.
Following years of violence, millions are displaced while the World Food Programme states that 15.9 million people wake up hungry e… [+2003 chars]
